name: Mission: Escape from Island 3
description:
Mission: Escape from Island 3 - a new episode of great shooter with amazing graphics! Dive into the story of a soldier who has gotten to the enemy army’s territory by his fate, where he can’t wait for help and can rely only on himself! Whether he can survive in this hell, depends on you only.
The unique survival experience on the island is guaranteed to you, so fight with hordes of enemies and constantly look for weapons. Unexpected continuation of the story of the past episode, upgraded graphics, new enemies and weapons, more diverse levels and wonderful effects will not leave you indifferent! Find out what happened on this strange island, where you find yourself. Good luck and enjoy the game!
